description:
The TileBase class is the base class for controls that display data items in a sequence of rows and columns. TileBase-derived classes ignore the variableRowHeight and wordWrap properties inherited from their parent class. All items in a TileList are the same width and height.

This class is not used directly in applications.

members.description:
The direction in which this control lays out its children. Possible values are TileBaseDirection.HORIZONTAL and TileBaseDirection.VERTICAL. The default value is TileBaseDirection.HORIZONTAL.

If the value is TileBaseDirection.HORIZONTAL, the tiles are laid out along the first row until the number of visible columns or maxColumns is reached and then a new row is started. If more rows are created than can be displayed at once, the control will display a vertical scrollbar. The opposite is true if the value is TileBaseDirection.VERTICAL.
